title: Multiple compass apps are reporting low accelerometer accuracy despite calibration. How do I fix?
content:
Have recently upgraded from an old Pixel XL where I never had a problem with reported sensor accuracy that a calibration would not fix.

Now using the same compass apps ("Digital Compass" by Axiomatic & "Compass" by melon soft) on my Pixel 4a 5G I am finding the accelerometer accuracy is constantly reported as low/bad. I have tried calibration (figure 8 thing) as well as using these apps with the phone in airplane mode. The accelerometer accuracy is never reported as anything other than low/bad. Not just these apps either, if I go to the calibration section of Google Maps the accuracy is also regularly (almost daily) reported as low.

How do I fix this or is it likely the accelerometer is just faulty?
